snippet.title: Commodore 64 -=Evil Dungeon 2=-
snippet.description:
Commodore 64 =Evil Dungeon 2=
***
Saberman&IndieRetroNews.com present: Evil Dungeon 2

is the sequel to EVIL DUNGEON the story of Alrik, a young adventurer who has just escaped the mysterious corridors of an underground dungeon beneath the city of Radrik. New quests are awaiting him now. Driven by adventure and the mission of avenging his parents murder, he goes on hunt for the degenerate orcs.

New in Evil Dungeon 2:
• A brand new fantasy story
• A new maze, enemies, items and puzzles
• Exclusive title and background music by Nordischsound (Benjamin Dibbert)
• Two alternative endings
• Now with quick save function!
• English and German version on one disk/image

Credits:
Gregor Schillinger
www.retroarts.de

Source:
https://retroarts.itch.io/evil-dungeon-2-c64
Download:
https://retroarts.itch.io/evil-dungeon-2-c64

@Saberman #Saberman #IndieRetroNews #commodore #commodore64 #c64 

👍 Thank you for making the game available Gregor Schillinger.
💰If you want to support the channel, please consider PayPal: https://www.paypal.com/paypalme/SabermanYT or Super Thanks under every video.
💗Thank you to all sympathizers of the channel - your support means a lot for me. Everybody who has supported me financially will be mentioned in the description below.
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCln0gnoHmFVq6REE54IOm4Q/join
***
Dariusz O.
Tomasz M.
